data.text:
Since that day, McQueen and I 
have spent our days training and recruiting.
data.processed:
<story>Since that day, McQueen and I 
<story>have spent our days training and recruiting.

data.text:
Since that day, McQueen and I 
have spent our days training and recruiting.
data.processed:
<story>Since that day, McQueen and I 
<story>have spent our days training and recruiting.

data.text:
However, our recruiting efforts have not been successful. Mejiro 
McQueen is still the only member of the team.
data.processed:
<story>However, our recruiting efforts have not been successful. Mejiro 
<story>McQueen is still the only member of the team.

data.text:
Well, while our lack of members is a problem, 
the more pressing issue is…
data.processed:
<story>Well, while our lack of members is a problem, 
<story>the more pressing issue is…

data.text: Hah… Haaa… Ha…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Hah… Haaa… Ha…

data.text:
There was Mejiro McQueen, training alone, on 
an empty track, in the middle of the night.
data.processed:
<story>There was Mejiro McQueen, training alone, on 
<story>an empty track, in the middle of the night.

data.text: I need to become faster!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I need to become faster!

data.text:
As I thought, my training regimen is not enough for her. 
She's been doing this every day since then.
data.processed:
<story>As I thought, my training regimen is not enough for her. 
<story>She's been doing this every day since then.

data.text:
As I thought, my training regimen is not enough for her. 
She's been doing this every day since then.
data.processed:
<story>As I thought, my training regimen is not enough for her. 
<story>She's been doing this every day since then.

data.text:
I understand that you're trying to solidify your 
foundation before the Spring Tennō Shō…
data.processed:
<story>I understand that you're trying to solidify your 
<story>foundation before the Spring Tennō Shō…

data.text:
But if you try too hard, the risk of you getting hurt will only 
increase… Should I tell her to stop being so selfish? Or should 
I change the training regimen to what she wants?
data.processed:
<story>But if you try too hard, the risk of you getting hurt will only 
<story>increase… Should I tell her to stop being so selfish? Or should 
<story>I change the training regimen to what she wants?

data.text: I absolutely must win the Spring Tennō Shō!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I absolutely must win the Spring Tennō Shō!

data.text:
What's the best way to achieve that? 
If Sensei were here, he'd know what to do… 
…My worries were endless.
data.processed:
<story>What's the best way to achieve that? 
<story>If Sensei were here, he'd know what to do… 
<story>…My worries were endless.

data.text:
The following day, I went to my office to prepare for another 
day of training. However, as I entered I noticed Mejiro McQueen 
and an Uma Musume that I had never met before.
data.processed:
<story>The following day, I went to my office to prepare for another 
<story>day of training. However, as I entered I noticed Mejiro McQueen 
<story>and an Uma Musume that I had never met before.

data.text:
Hello, Trainer-san! 
Sorry to bother you!

choices.text: Are you… here to join the team!?
Are you… here to join the team!?

data.processed:
<story>Hello, Trainer-san! 
<story>Sorry to bother you!

data.text:
Incorrect. Her name is Mejiro Ryan. She's a 
part of the Mejiro family, just like me.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Incorrect. Her name is Mejiro Ryan. She's a 
<story>part of the Mejiro family, just like me.

data.text:
She mentioned she had something to talk to 
you about, so I simply brought her here.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>She mentioned she had something to talk to 
<story>you about, so I simply brought her here.

data.text:
Nice to meet you! I really wanted to talk 
to you, so I asked her to introduce me.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Nice to meet you! I really wanted to talk 
<story>to you, so I asked her to introduce me.

data.text:
Well then, I'm going to go and 
try to recruit some new members.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Well then, I'm going to go and 
<story>try to recruit some new members.

data.text:
Hmm? McQueen, you're not 
going to stay here with us?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Hmm? McQueen, you're not 
<story>going to stay here with us?

data.text:
Well, you see, Ryan wanted to have a secret 
conversation between the two of you.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Well, you see, Ryan wanted to have a secret 
<story>conversation between the two of you.

data.text:
Nuisances should leave immediately, right? 
And I'm a nuisance, right?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Nuisances should leave immediately, right? 
<story>And I'm a nuisance, right?

data.text:
No, I'm not mad. Whatever secrets you two 
may have doesn't concern me, after all.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>No, I'm not mad. Whatever secrets you two 
<story>may have doesn't concern me, after all.

data.text: So, I hope you two enjoy yourselves!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>So, I hope you two enjoy yourselves!

data.text:
Ahaha, she's so cute when she's jealous. Trust me, I'm not trying 
to steal your trainer away from you.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha, she's so cute when she's jealous. Trust me, I'm not trying 
<story>to steal your trainer away from you.

data.text: So, what was it you needed to talk about?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>So, what was it you needed to talk about?

data.text: It's about McQueen.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>It's about McQueen.

data.text:
You've probably noticed already, 
but she's pushing herself way too hard.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>You've probably noticed already, 
<story>but she's pushing herself way too hard.

data.text:
You really did notice, huh? 
You're just like McQueen said you'd be.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>You really did notice, huh? 
<story>You're just like McQueen said you'd be.

data.text:
“She can be unreliable at times, but she is always sincere and 
thinking about what's best for us Uma Musume.”
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>“She can be unreliable at times, but she is always sincere and 
<story>thinking about what's best for us Uma Musume.”

data.text:
McQueen is always talking 
about you in a good light.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>McQueen is always talking 
<story>about you in a good light.

data.text:
“And that's why, no matter what happens, I will be 
with her until the end.” Those were her words.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>“And that's why, no matter what happens, I will be 
<story>with her until the end.” Those were her words.

data.text:
She really said those things…? 
I thought she didn't trust me…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>She really said those things…? 
<story>I thought she didn't trust me…

data.text:
She really said those things…? 
I thought she didn't trust me…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>She really said those things…? 
<story>I thought she didn't trust me…

data.text:
I figured that was the case because, no matter how unsatisfied 
she was with my training regimen, she wouldn't say anything. 
Instead, she would do her own independent training…
data.processed:
<story>I figured that was the case because, no matter how unsatisfied 
<story>she was with my training regimen, she wouldn't say anything. 
<story>Instead, she would do her own independent training…

data.text: No way, she has absolute faith in you.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>No way, she has absolute faith in you.

data.text:
However, there is a reason she's been pushing herself 
so hard. It's because of the Tennō Shō.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>However, there is a reason she's been pushing herself 
<story>so hard. It's because of the Tennō Shō.

data.text:
You see, us members of the Mejiro Family are expected to compete 
in certain races based on our aptitudes…
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>You see, us members of the Mejiro Family are expected to compete 
<story>in certain races based on our aptitudes…

data.text:
For example, I'm expected to win the Classic while she's expected 
to win the Tennō Shō due to her ability as a stayer.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>For example, I'm expected to win the Classic while she's expected 
<story>to win the Tennō Shō due to her ability as a stayer.

data.text:
And winning the Tennō Shō is a staple of the Mejiro Family, and a 
very important race for our Grandmother and Grandfather…
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>And winning the Tennō Shō is a staple of the Mejiro Family, and a 
<story>very important race for our Grandmother and Grandfather…

data.text:
Ever since she was a child, McQueen has been expected to win the 
Tennō Shō, and for that reason she's been carrying the weight of 
that responsibility alone for so long.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Ever since she was a child, McQueen has been expected to win the 
<story>Tennō Shō, and for that reason she's been carrying the weight of 
<story>that responsibility alone for so long.

data.text:
So that's why she's been doing 
her independent training every night?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>So that's why she's been doing 
<story>her independent training every night?

data.text:
So that's why she's been doing 
her independent training every night?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>So that's why she's been doing 
<story>her independent training every night?

data.text:
She's probably anxious. Not only does she have the pressure of 
having to win the Tennō Shō, your team has also had its own 
problems lately, right?
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>She's probably anxious. Not only does she have the pressure of 
<story>having to win the Tennō Shō, your team has also had its own 
<story>problems lately, right?

data.text:
McQueen is a very serious person, so she 
probably feels a responsibility to fix this. So…
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>McQueen is a very serious person, so she 
<story>probably feels a responsibility to fix this. So…

data.text:
It seems like McQueen is just acting tough, while deep down she's 
incredibly anxious. She probably uses her independent training 
as a means to distract her from that anxiety.
data.processed:
<story>It seems like McQueen is just acting tough, while deep down she's 
<story>incredibly anxious. She probably uses her independent training 
<story>as a means to distract her from that anxiety.

data.text:
So I need you to stop her 
before she pushes herself too hard.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>So I need you to stop her 
<story>before she pushes herself too hard.

data.text:
I think that if you talk to her 
about this she'll be sure to listen.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>I think that if you talk to her 
<story>about this she'll be sure to listen.

data.text: Damn it, what have I been doing?
data.processed: <story>Damn it, what have I been doing?

data.text: Damn it, what have I been doing?
data.processed: <story>Damn it, what have I been doing?

data.text:
I was so focused on what was going on around me, I failed to see 
what was happening to Mejiro McQueen right in front of me.
data.processed:
<story>I was so focused on what was going on around me, I failed to see 
<story>what was happening to Mejiro McQueen right in front of me.

data.text:
…Thank you, Ryan. 
You've taught me some very important things.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>…Thank you, Ryan. 
<story>You've taught me some very important things.

data.text: Ehehe, you're welcome!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Ehehe, you're welcome!

data.text:
After all, she's like a little sister to me. 
And a treasured rival.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>After all, she's like a little sister to me. 
<story>And a treasured rival.

data.text: So I leave the rest to you!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>So I leave the rest to you!
